metadata.title: CVE-2022-32250 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - high
metadata.description:
net/netfilter/nf_tables_api.c in the Linux kernel through 5.18.1 allows alocal user (able to create user/net namespaces) to escalate privileges toroot because an incorrect NFT_STATEFUL_EXPR check leads to ause-after-free.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-32250` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-37-generic - 5.15.0-37.39
linux-image-5.15.0-37-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-37.39
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-37-generic - 5.15.0-37.39
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-37-generic-64k - 5.15.0-37.39
No subscription required

No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-37.39').
